Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Port Authority Detective Thomas Inman Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system in the town of Islip, county of Suffolk, as the "Port Authority Detective Thomas Inman Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Port Authority Detective Thomas Inman Memorial Bridge"
